attributes.action: re-run UK European elections if the Brexit Party has acted illegally in any way.
attributes.additional_details: Mant postal voters have already voted, the vote takes place on 23 May. If the Brexit Party has behaved illegally we must have the opportunity to vote again.
attributes.background: The Brexit Party is being investigated for foreign funding or illegal funding and may have acted illegally.

rejection.details: Investigating potential breaches of electoral law is the responsibility of the police and Electoral Commission, which is independent of both the Government and Parliament.
